mapper.update: update m_orderformfield set FieldEnName = #{fieldenname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FieldCnName = #{fieldcnname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FieldType = #{fieldtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OrderFormType = #{orderformtype,jdbcType=INTEGER} where FieldId = #{fieldid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select FieldId, FieldEnName, FieldCnName, Remark, FieldType, OrderFormType from m_orderformfield
